         Video:        352x240 30fps DivX 50
         Audio:        40k 24kHz MP3 mono, Fixed, joined
         Running Time: 1 hour 56 minutes 5 seconds
         Filesize:     324,520,128 bytes / 316,914.19 KB / 309.49 MB

      The original came in two MPEG files that were 1.31GB (!!!) in size.
      There were a number of problems with it:

      * audio was stereo, but only 1 channel contained actual data
      * audio was barely.. audible, you'd have to turn volume way up
      * video quality was very low, not warranting the high bitrate

      All of these problems have been fixed.  Audio was fixed; video was
      reprocessed using DIVX 5.1, taking care as to not lose any visual
      quality, while saving a massive amount of storage space.  It went
      from 1.31GB to 309MB - that's over 1GB saved, or about 77%!  And, to
      top it all off, this *WILL* play in your set-top DivX player. 

      So, enjoy and think about what the man says.  All I ask is that you
      help spread it around - Noam *IS* one of the greatest thinkers of our
      trying times!

-iDi

      NOTE:  The quality of the video is quite fair, this was so in the
      original, it is NOT because of reprocessing.  It's all I had to work
      with.  But unlike your latest mindless action Hollywood blockbuster,
      what's important here is what the man says, not how it looks.


 -BhangWalla-
